name: SilverQuest: Gaiden
description: SilverQuest: Gaiden is an incredibly moddable old-school roguelike. Add and expand on your experience with other users monsters, quests, biomes and more with ease!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Anything probably Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
